item.title: NEM Green
item.description:
NEM Green

NEM Green - The selected artworks by Giancarlo Beltrame. Featured artists: Andrea Koerner, Benamon Tame, Davide Capponi, Fabio D'Andrea, Federica Corbelli, Paul Brown, Perla Hernandez and Simone Reynolds

item.title: Be Unexpected. Be Human.
item.description:
Be Unexpected. Be Human.

Impossible Humans - The Unexpected Happening - Auditorium Rome - March 12th A New Era Museum & Pollock Project Art Happening Music by Andrea Bigiarini "Be Unexpected. Be Human" ProShow Web Video Slideshow

item.title: Kansas City 2014
item.description:
Kansas City 2014

Proposals, desire and dreams that you would like to see realized for a new world and better society and culture throughout your vision. Each of your images will be the bricks for this New Era.

item.title: TRACY J THOMAS - SELECTIONS FOR "NEM BLACK&WHITE" - 11
item.description:
TRACY J THOMAS - SELECTIONS FOR "NEM BLACK&WHITE" - 11

THESE ARE THE 8 ENTRIES SELECTED BY TRACY J THOMAS FOR THE "NEM BLACK&WHITE" PHOTO-ACTION ON EYEEM. TRACY J THOMAS - NEM FOUNDER ARTIST AND CURATOR FOR "NEM BLACK&WHITE."

item.title: Synchronicity V-Ex
item.description:
Synchronicity V-Ex

ARTWORKS BY: Douce @ladouce, Vanessa Vox @vanessavox, Bob Heerooms @bobheerooms, Brett Chenoweth @brettchen, Ailyn Argun @xxfromneptune, Stefania P.

item.title: René Valencia V-Ex
item.description:
René Valencia V-Ex

"Yes, but who will cure us of the deaf fire, of the colorless fire that runs thru the dusk of the rue of Huchette, going out thru the rotten doorways, of the decayed exteriors, of the imageless fire that licks stones and stalks in the doorsteps ..."

item.title: IMPOSSIBLE HUMANS - Pollock Project / photo by New Era Museum
item.description:
IMPOSSIBLE HUMANS - Pollock Project / photo by New Era Museum

IMPOSSIBLE HUMANS - Pollock Project ft. NEM Marco Testoni (piano, caisa drum), Simone Salza (alto sax), Elisabetta Antonini (vocal, live electronics). AH!

item.title: IHUH ROME 2016 - THE 10 SELECTED ARTWORKS
item.description:
IHUH ROME 2016 - THE 10 SELECTED ARTWORKS

Impossible Humans Unexpected Happening ExhibitionMarch 11-26 2016 GALLERIA LANCELLOTTI - ROME The Impossible Humans Unexpected Happening International Jury formed by: ALDO PACHECO, ANDY BUTLER, BRENDAN Ó SÉ, CLARISSE DEBOUT, DIETER GAEBEL, DILSHAD CORLEONE, MARK DANIELS, NETTIE EDWARDS, PATRICIA LARSON & ALEX VISAGE. Has decided.

item.title: NEM SUBMISSIONS (February 2016) Echoes - Jane Schultz selection
item.description:
NEM SUBMISSIONS (February 2016) Echoes - Jane Schultz selection

Jane Schultz Selection 03 from NEM Facebook Group Jane Schultz - NEM Artists and Curator of NEM Submissions "[...]we are all as full of echoes as a rocky wood--echoes of the past, reflex echoes of the future, and echoes of the soil (these last reverberating through our filmiest dreams, like the sound of thunder in a blossoming orchard)."
